de.lambeck.pned.application.actions

Interface IActionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionManager

    public interface IActionManager
    Interface for the ActionManager
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enableActionsForOpenFiles(java.lang.String activeFile)
      Enables or disables all AbstractAction that depend on at least 1 open file.
      void enableActionsForSelectedElements(java.util.List<IGuiElement> selected)
      Enables or disables all AbstractAction that depend on the number of selected IGuiElement.
      void enableUndoRedoActions(java.lang.String activeFile)
      Enables EditUndoAction and EditRedoAction if edits may be undone/redone.
      void enableZValueActions(IGuiElement element)
      Enables all appropriate AbstractAction for the Z value if exactly one IGuiElement is selected or at the popup menu location.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.AbstractAction> getAllActions() 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.AbstractAction> getPopupActions() 

    • Method Detail

      • getAllActions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.AbstractAction> getAllActions()
        Returns:
        The Map with all AbstractAction for this application

      • getPopupActions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.AbstractAction> getPopupActions()
        Returns:
        The Map with all AbstractAction for popup menus for this application

      • enableActionsForOpenFiles

        void enableActionsForOpenFiles(java.lang.String activeFile)
        Enables or disables all AbstractAction that depend on at least 1 open file.

        Note: This method should mainly be used by the ApplicationController.
        Parameters:
        activeFile - The full path name of the current file

      • enableActionsForSelectedElements

        void enableActionsForSelectedElements(java.util.List<IGuiElement> selected)
        Enables or disables all AbstractAction that depend on the number of selected IGuiElement.

        Note: This method should mainly be used by the IGuiModelController.
        Parameters:
        selected - The List of selected IGuiElement

      • enableZValueActions

        void enableZValueActions(IGuiElement element)
        Enables all appropriate AbstractAction for the Z value if exactly one IGuiElement is selected or at the popup menu location.

        Note: This method should mainly be used by the IGuiModelController.
        Parameters:
        element - The IGuiElement that is currently selected or at the popup menu location, or null = no element selected and no element at the popup menu location

      • enableUndoRedoActions

        void enableUndoRedoActions(java.lang.String activeFile)
        Enables EditUndoAction and EditRedoAction if edits may be undone/redone.

        Note: This method should mainly be used by the ApplicationController after an Undo/Redo operation or when the user switches between open files.
        Parameters:
        activeFile - The full path name of the current file
